name: linsys-v

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: LINSYS_V: Verified Solution of Linear Systems

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description:
CLBlast is a modern, lightweight, performant and tunable OpenCL BLAS
library written in C++11. It is designed to leverage the full
performance potential of a wide variety of OpenCL devices from different
vendors, including desktop and laptop GPUs, embedded GPUs, and other
accelerators. CLBlast implements BLAS routines: basic linear algebra
subprograms operating on vectors and matrices.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description:
Arm Performance Libraries provides optimized standard core math
libraries for high-performance computing applications on Arm processors.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description: Cray/HPE packaging of MVAPICH2 for HPE Apollo systems

dependencies.name: scalapack
dependencies.description:
ScaLAPACK is a library of high-performance linear algebra routines for
parallel distributed memory machines
